mcp.instructions: Snippy is an intelligent code snippet service with AI-powered analysis. Available tools: save_snippet (save code with vector embeddings), get_snippet (retrieve saved snippets by name), code_style (generate style guides from snippets), and deep_wiki (create comprehensive documentation). Use save_snippet with 'snippetname' and 'snippet' parameters, optionally include 'projectid'. Retrieve snippets using get_snippet with 'snippetname'. Generate documentation with code_style or deep_wiki, optionally providing 'chathistory' and 'userquery' for context.
